body:
Jack de Valpine wrote:

There is interest...  =8-)

On a related note, does anyone here have experience with Oracle's
cluster file system (ocfs)?  My IT guy here thinks this filesystem might
eliminate all the nasty file locking problems that have plagued rpiece
on linux for years.  I was about to test this out myself when I get some
free time, as we now have two nodes that are running it, but I haven't
had a chance yet.

- Rob
subject: [Radiance-general] rpiece question
